bug.author: kparichay
bug.description:
SSAT build checker fails in "nnstreamer_repo_rnn", and disappears with rebuild. This can be seen with PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/1237>#1237</denchmark-link> . This link corresponds to the details when the build failed - <denchmark-link:http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1237-201903151942480.91760110855103-d5e4565aef5f97d05aff6aca996e21a093b2266a/>http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1237-201903151942480.91760110855103-d5e4565aef5f97d05aff6aca996e21a093b2266a/</denchmark-link>
And this link corresponds to the build passing with the same code - <denchmark-link:http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1237-201903151955380.72278594970703-86521663b36e86e09a17183730699709fe35d9c7/>http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1237-201903151955380.72278594970703-86521663b36e86e09a17183730699709fe35d9c7/</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1247>#1247</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
To recreate the error, try: <denchmark-code>NNStreamer/tests/nnstreamer_repo_rnn$ X=0; while [ "$X" == "0" ]; do rm *.log; rm *.xraw; ssat; X=$? ; done </denchmark-code>
